award_title: Creating Robust Opportunities for Student Success through Real-world, Organized, and Applied Data Science
subject: Making your teaching code reusable without the email burden
body:
Hi Li,

You're building pathways for students to learn data science across disciplines—which means you're probably sharing a lot of code, notebooks, and methods.

I'm working on Ouro, a place where computational methods become callable endpoints. Instead of re-sharing scripts or answering "how do I run this?" emails, your work becomes infrastructure others can just use.

It consolidates what you're already doing—making your teaching materials accessible—into something durable.

Worth a quick chat? I know it's the holiday season, so no rush.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
